title: "Hypocrite": Kamala Harris Slams Trump Over Abortion As US Starts Voting
content: Kamala Harris on Friday attacked Republican rival Donald Trump and his party as "hypocrites" over abortion, as the first voters cast their ballots for November's knife-edge US election.
summary: Kamala Harris on Friday attacked Republican rival Donald Trump and his party as "hypocrites" over abortion, as the first voters cast their ballots for November's knife-edge US election.

title: UN Condemns Lebanon Device Blasts As Violation Of International Law
content: The United Nations on Friday denounced the detonation of hand-held devices used by Hezbollah operatives in Lebanon, saying the attack violated international law and could constitute a war crime.
summary: The United Nations on Friday denounced the detonation of hand-held devices used by Hezbollah operatives in Lebanon, saying the attack violated international law and could constitute a war crime.

title: What Lankan President, Seeking Re-Election, Said About India: 5 Key Quotes
content: A day before Sri Lanka votes for the next President, Ranil Wickremesinghe, who currently occupies the post spoke to NDTV. During the interview, he spoke about his country's special bond with India and how he aims to strengthen ties, if re-elected.
summary: A day before Sri Lanka votes for the next President, Ranil Wickremesinghe, who currently occupies the post spoke to NDTV. During the interview, he spoke about his country's special bond with India and how he aims to strengthen ties, if re-elected.

title: Killed Hezbollah Commander Was Wanted For Deadly 1983 US Embassy Blast
content: Ibrahim Aqil, the Hezbollah operations commander killed in an Israeli strike on Friday, had a $7 million bounty on his head for two 1983 Beirut truck bombings that killed more than 300 people at the American embassy and a U.S. Marines barracks.
summary: Ibrahim Aqil, the Hezbollah operations commander killed in an Israeli strike on Friday, had a $7 million bounty on his head for two 1983 Beirut truck bombings that killed more than 300 people at the American embassy and a U.S. Marines barracks.

title: How Hack Of Hezbollah Devices Exposes Dark Corners Of Asia Supply Chains
content: The lethal hack of Hezbollah's Asian-branded pagers and walkie-talkies has sparked an intense search for the devices' path, revealing a murky market for older technologies where buyers may have few assurances about what they are getting.
summary: The lethal hack of Hezbollah's Asian-branded pagers and walkie-talkies has sparked an intense search for the devices' path, revealing a murky market for older technologies where buyers may have few assurances about what they are getting.

title: US National Tortured To Death In Ukraine By Russian soldiers, Moscow Says
content: Russell Bentley, a US national who went missing in Russian-controlled eastern Ukraine early this year, is believed to have been tortured to death by Russian soldiers who are now set to go on trial, Russia's top investigative body said on Friday.
summary: Russell Bentley, a US national who went missing in Russian-controlled eastern Ukraine early this year, is believed to have been tortured to death by Russian soldiers who are now set to go on trial, Russia's top investigative body said on Friday.

title: US Secret Service Admits Lack Of Diligence Ahead Of Trump Rally Shooting
content: A US Secret Service probe found communication gaps and a lack of diligence ahead of the July attempted assassination of Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump at a Butler, Pennsylvania rally.
summary: A US Secret Service probe found communication gaps and a lack of diligence ahead of the July attempted assassination of Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump at a Butler, Pennsylvania rally.

title: As Sri Lanka Votes, NDTV Asks Presidential Candidate 9 Key Questions
content: Sri Lanka will vote to elect the next President on Saturday. While current President Ranil Wickremesinghe is seeking another term in office, he is being challenged by the key Opposition leader Sajith Premadasa.
summary: Sri Lanka will vote to elect the next President on Saturday. While current President Ranil Wickremesinghe is seeking another term in office, he is being challenged by the key Opposition leader Sajith Premadasa.

title: "Truly Sorry": French Mayor For "No One Died" Remark On Mass Rape Case
content: The mayor of the French town where a man for over a decade brought strangers to rape his wife apologised on Friday for remarks that were criticised for playing down the ordeal of the victim.
summary: The mayor of the French town where a man for over a decade brought strangers to rape his wife apologised on Friday for remarks that were criticised for playing down the ordeal of the victim.

title: A Modern 'Trojan Horse': How Hezbollah Faced 2 Days Of Mayhem In Lebanon
content: It's around 3:30 in the afternoon on September 17. People in Lebanon are going about their daily business, doing the shopping, having a haircut, conducting meetings.
summary: It's around 3:30 in the afternoon on September 17. People in Lebanon are going about their daily business, doing the shopping, having a haircut, conducting meetings.

title: Sunita Williams Celebrates Birthday In Space. Not Her 1st Time
content: Indian-Origin astronaut Sunita Williams has celebrated her 59th birthday -- the second in space.
summary: Indian-Origin astronaut Sunita Williams has celebrated her 59th birthday -- the second in space.

title: Top Hezbollah Commander Killed As Israeli Strike Rattles Beirut
content: Israel announced it had killed the commander of Hezbollah's elite unit in a strike Friday that Lebanese officials said left 12 dead and dozens wounded in the movement's Beirut stronghold.
summary: Israel announced it had killed the commander of Hezbollah's elite unit in a strike Friday that Lebanese officials said left 12 dead and dozens wounded in the movement's Beirut stronghold.

title: UN's Summit Of The Future Has Arrived. Here's All You Need To Know
content: With just six years left to meet the deadline for the United Nations' Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), the world is not on track to meet those targets.
summary: With just six years left to meet the deadline for the United Nations' Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), the world is not on track to meet those targets.

title: Hezbollah Handed Out Pagers Hours Before Blasts - Even After Checks
content: Hezbollah was handing its members new Gold Apollo branded pagers hours before thousands blew up this week, two security sources said, indicating they were confident the devices were safe despite an ongoing sweep of electronic kit to identify threats.
summary: Hezbollah was handing its members new Gold Apollo branded pagers hours before thousands blew up this week, two security sources said, indicating they were confident the devices were safe despite an ongoing sweep of electronic kit to identify threats.

title: 4 Key Obstacles To India Joining UN Security Council With Veto Power
content: Indian politicians have argued for decades that the nation deserves to be a member of the United Nations Security Council (UNSC).

title: Google Ex-Employee Shares Struggle For Indians To Find Job In Canada
content: Is work experience from India not enough to fetch you a decent salary abroad? A video of an Indian man, who works as a process inventory associate in Canada, highlights the struggle to land a job.

title: "So Dumb": Melinda French Gates Slams CEOs Who Brag About Sleep Deprivation

summary: In a recent interview, Melinda French Gates criticised CEOs and tech entrepreneurs who boast about functioning on minimal sleep, calling the trend "so dumb."

title: Watch: Panting, Barking Dogs Painted As Pandas At China Zoo
content: A zoo in the Shanwei city of China's eastern Guangdong province was forced to admit that the pandas in their exhibits are, in fact, "painted dogs".

title: Hezbollah Chief Admits Group Suffered "Major" Blow In Lebanon Device Blasts
